Modules¶

Contents:

Genomics¶

  • AString.py - a compact string of characters
  • Blat.py - tools for working with psl formatted files and data
  • FastaIterator.py - iterate over fasta files
  • IndexedFasta.py - fast random access in fasta files
  • Intervals.py -
  • Mali.py - Tools for multiple alignments
  • MaliIO.py -
  • Masker.py - Wrapper for sequence masking tools
  • SequencePairProperties.py -
  • SequenceProperties.py - compute properties of sequences
  • GTF.py - Classes and methods for dealing with gtf formatted files
  • Bed.py - Tools for working with bed files
  • GO.py - compute GO enrichment from gene lists
  • GenomicIO.py - Subroutines for working on I/O of large genomic files
  • Genomics.py - Tools for working with genomic data
  • Maq.py -
  • Wiggle.py - Support for the wiggle format used by `ucsc`_.
  • AGP.py - working with AGP files
  • Regions.py - helper functions for working with genomic segments
  • Synteny.py -
  • AlignedPairs.py -
  • ProfileLibrary.py -
  • ProfileLibraryCompass.py -

Phylogeny¶

  • Tree.py - A derivation of the tree class from Biopython
  • TreeTools.py - tools for dealing with domain trees.
  • RateEstimation.py - utilities for computing rate estimates for codon models.
  • PamMatrices.py -

Math and Stats¶

  • CorrespondenceAnalysis.py -
  • Histogram.py - Various functions to deal with histograms
  • Histogram2D.py - functions for handling two-dimensional histograms.
  • Stats.py -
  • MatlabTools.py -
  • MatrixTools.py -

Gpipe and OPTIC¶

  • Exons.py - A library to read/write/manage exons.
  • Orthologs.py - tools to deal with Leo’s orthology pipeline.
  • Prediction.py - Gene prediction with exonerate/genewise
  • PredictionFile.py -
  • PredictionParser.py - Parser for exonerate/genewise output
  • Predictor.py - running gene predictions with exonerate
  • BlastAlignments.py - tools for working with alignments

Tools¶

  • Experiment.py - Tools for scripts
  • CSV.py - Tools for parsing CSV files
  • IOTools - tools for I/O operations
  • Iterators.py - general purpose iterators.
  • Database.py -
  • ExternalList.py - large disk-based lists
  • ProgressBar.py -

Pipelines¶

  • Pipeline.py - Tools for ruffus pipelines
  • PipelineTracks.py - Definition of tracks in pipelines
  • PipelineMapping.py - Utility functions for mapping short reads
  • PipelineAnnotator.py -
  • PipelineBiomart.py - utility tasks for importing data from biomart
  • PipelineChipseq.py - ChIP-Seq tasks associated with intervals.
  • PipelineDatabase.py - utility functions for working with a database
  • PipelineEnrichment.py -
  • Purpose
  • Usage
  • Code
  • PipelineGeneset.py - utility tasks for dealing with ENSEMBL gene sets
  • PipelineIntervalAnnotation.py - Tasks associated with annotation of genomic intervals
  • PipelineKegg.py - Pipeline components related to KEGG analysis
  • PipelineLncRNA.py - functions and classes for use with the lincRNA pipeline
  • PipelineMapping.py - Utility functions for mapping short reads
  • PipelineMappingQC.py - common tasks for QC’ing mapping
  • PipelineMedip.py - tasks associated with MedipSeq analysis
  • pipeline_vitaminD_motifs.py -
  • PipelinePeakCalling.py - ChIP-Seq tasks associated with calling peaks
  • Rnaseq.py - Tools for RNAseq analysis
  • PipelineTracks.py - Definition of tracks in pipelines
  • PipelineTransfacMatch.py - Classes and functions used in pipeline_trasfacmatch.py
  • PipelineUCSC.py - utility functions for accessing UCSC data
  • PipelineUtilities.py - helper functions for CGAT pipelines
